summary: Caladan Dremlock, a traveler at the Sleeping Giant in Riverwood, has noted that bandits are up to something at Lordan\'s Rest, a nearby tomb. Travel to the tomb and learn what you can, though beware the bandits and what they may have disturbed.
descriptionHtml:
Caladan Dremlock, a traveler at the Sleeping Giant in Riverwood, has noted that bandits are up to something at Lordan\'s Rest, a nearby tomb. Travel to the tomb and learn what you can, though beware the bandits and what they may have disturbed.

Features:
- New dungeon to expand content.
- Accompanying quest to increase lore.
- Leveled encounters and loot to accommodate player level.
- Custom npc, bosses, and loot.

This is my first attempt at any form of modding, so please be patient and I would appreciate any feedback.
Mod also available on the SteamWorkshop.

Version 1.1 Update
-refined Navmesh to address movement issues.
-removed spoken dialogue due to a number of issues associated with the files not consistently loading and playing.
author: wkyfam

files.name: LeavetheDeadBe1_1
files.changelogHtml:
refined Navmesh
removed spoken dialogue due to a number of issues.
